title: Farshyar
description: a Python client-based bot for extracting useful data from telegram channels for a carpet shop. This bot uses MariaDB for storing data and images. It also manages multiple request or task asynchronously. communication with database is by using connection pools. I got to mention that it uses APScheduler for scheduled task. The bot also supports deleting or updating a record whenever it was changed in the channel.

title: Catcher
description: The Catcher is a Python-based & client based bot using Telethon to monitor Telegram channels, extract product prices, convert them, and store them in PostgreSQL. It also subscribes to new channels based on previous joins and generates reports.

title: Roderfile
description: a CLI tool that you can organize your files with

title: RoachGram
description: this is a social media project that I built to improve my skills in django and django rest framework

title: URL Shortener
description: it's a REST API application that you can shorten your links and share them with your friends.
